page.title: 05FOX FRUIT FARM
page.content: Fox Fruit is a local firm, which was established as an orchard 16 years ago. They produce a variety of apples to give a succession of fruit from September onwards. These varieties include Katy,Discovery and Cox. In 1984 a new variety, developed by the firm, was introduced onto the market. This is called Fox Delight.Two children from our school,Vicky Hinds and Robert Cross were invited to take part in a short newsreel film for television.They were filmed in the orchard eating Fox Delight and were then asked what it was like.The firm also grows two varieties of pear, Commis and Conference. All the fruit produced is for the table and is sold locally or is sent to markets in this country.
